title: Exception is thrown when exporting data from a table containing highlight and map rules
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from the attached report. Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table to the report that includes a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
OB: When attempting to export data from a table containing a highlight and map rules in the group row, an exception is thrown.
EB: The data should be successfully exported from the table containing the highlight and map rules.
SR:
1. Add a table to the report that includes a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
